comprehensive_overview: p7zip is a command-line file archiver that supports the 7z compression format and various other archive formats. It is based on the open-source LZMA compression algorithm.
core_features: Supports creating and extracting 7z, XZ, GZIP, TAR, ZIP, and other archive formats
High compression ratio with the use of the LZMA algorithm
Can be used in automation scripts and batch processing
Cross-platform compatibility on Windows, Linux, and macOS
